page.title: The $itemName
page.text: The $itemName is used to refine [item name=matter_dust] into [item name=matter_dust_refined]. That allows the recycling of any [item name=matter_dust] byproduct from replication or decomposing.

page.title: How to use
page.text: By putting the [item name=matter_dust] in the input slot and providing power to the $itemName. You can recycle some [item name=matter_dust_refined]. You can then use it in a [item name=decomposer] to breakdown into [guide name=matter_plasma].
